scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade npm version" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && cd ../../dist/ts-hockeydata-api && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && cd ../../dist/ts-hockeydata-api && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && cd ../../dist/ts-hockeydata-api && npm publish
